Room.Name: Eldritch's Tomb
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the tomb of the great Oceancrest hero, Eldritch.
Room.LongDescription: Eldritch was a mighty warrior long ago in the history of Oceancrest, and was known throughout the Land of Mordor. He was always a protector of the weak and innocent, and rose to a very high level in the services of the king. He fell here in the Necropolis while battling dark forces and evil spirits, and now he rests forever in this tomb. Do not disturb him.
